00051   class ListEntry
00052   {
00053   protected:
00055     std::pair<simtime_t, Argument::mapped_type> basicTimestamp;
00056 
00057   public:
00059     ListEntry(simtime_t_cref time, Argument::mapped_type_cref value)
00060       : basicTimestamp(time, value)
00061     {}
00062 
00063     virtual ~ListEntry() {}
00064 
00066     simtime_t getTime() const {
00067       return basicTimestamp.first;
00068     }
00069 
00071     void setTime(simtime_t_cref time) {
00072       basicTimestamp.first = time;
00073     }
00074 
00076     Argument::mapped_type getValue() const {
00077       return basicTimestamp.second;
00078     }
00079 
00081     void setValue(Argument::mapped_type_cref value) {
00082       basicTimestamp.second = value;
00083     }
00084 
00089     friend bool operator<(const ListEntry& e, simtime_t_cref t) {
00090       return (e.getTime() < t);
00091     }
00092 
00097     friend bool operator<(simtime_t_cref t, const ListEntry& e) {
00098       return (t < e.getTime());
00099     }
00100 
00105     friend bool operator<(const ListEntry& left, const ListEntry& right) {
00106       return (left.getTime() < right.getTime());
00107     }
00108   };
00109 
00110 
00114   bool currentlyTracking;
00115 
00117   std::list<ListEntry> radioStateAttenuation;
00118 
00119 public:
00120 
00126   RadioStateAnalogueModel(Argument::mapped_type_cref initValue,
00127               bool currentlyTracking = false,
00128               simtime_t_cref initTime = SIMTIME_ZERO)
00129     : AnalogueModel()
00130     , currentlyTracking(currentlyTracking)
00131     , radioStateAttenuation()
00132   {
00133     // put the initial time-stamp to the list
00134     radioStateAttenuation.push_back(ListEntry(initTime, initValue));
00135   }
00136

00370     assert(newChannel > -1);
00371     assert(newChannel < nbChannels);
00372     currentChannel = newChannel;
00373     radioChannels.record(currentChannel);
00374   }

00410   virtual void makeRSAMEntry(simtime_t_cref time, int state)
00411   {
00412     rsam.writeRecvEntry(time, mapStateToAtt(state));
00413   }
00414 
00419   virtual Argument::mapped_type_cref mapStateToAtt(int state)
00420   {
00421     if (state == RX) {
00422       return minAtt;
00423     }
00424     else{
00425       return maxAtt;
00426     }
00427   }

00582 class MIXIM_API RSAMMapping : public ConstMapping
00583 {
00584 protected:
00585 
00587   const RadioStateAnalogueModel* rsam;
00589   simtime_t signalStart;
00591   simtime_t signalEnd;
00592 
00593 public:
00597   RSAMMapping(const RSAMMapping& o)
00598     : ConstMapping(o)
00599     , rsam(o.rsam)
00600     , signalStart(o.signalStart)
00601     , signalEnd(o.signalEnd)
00602   { }
00603 
00610   RSAMMapping& operator=(const RSAMMapping& copy) {
00611     RSAMMapping tmp(copy);
00612 
00613     swap(tmp);
00614     return *this;
00615   }
00616 
00625   void swap(RSAMMapping& s) {
00626     ConstMapping::swap(s);
00627     std::swap(rsam,        s.rsam);
00628     std::swap(signalStart, s.signalStart);
00629     std::swap(signalEnd,   s.signalEnd);
00630   }
00631 
00632 public:
00637   RSAMMapping(const RadioStateAnalogueModel* rsam,
00638         simtime_t_cref signalStart,
00639         simtime_t_cref signalEnd) :
00640     ConstMapping(),
00641     rsam(rsam),
00642     signalStart(signalStart),
00643     signalEnd(signalEnd)
00644   {
00645     assert(rsam);
00646     assert( !(signalStart < rsam->radioStateAttenuation.front().getTime()) );
00647   }
00648 
00649   virtual ~RSAMMapping() {}
00650 
00660   virtual argument_value_t getValue(const Argument& pos) const;
00661 
00666   virtual ConstMappingIterator* createConstIterator() const
00667   {
00668     return new RSAMConstMappingIterator(rsam, signalStart, signalEnd);
00669   }
00670 
00676   virtual ConstMappingIterator* createConstIterator(const Argument& pos) const;
00677 
00678   virtual ConstMapping* constClone() const {
00679     return new RSAMMapping(*this);
00680   }
00681 
00682 }; // end class RSAMMapping
